content:
Hi all!

The Italian category theory community ItaCa is organizing a its annual meeting in Turin this year, after past editions in Pisa 2022, Genova 2021 and Milano 2019 - don't ask about 2020: it was Corona's year!

Below you can find the announcement with all the infos. Everybody is welcome!

Beppe.

===================================
4th ItaCa WORKSHOP
https://progetto-itaca.github.io/ItaCa-23/
===================================

The 4th ItaCa Workshop will take place in Turin, Italy, on December 18-19, 2023.

ItaCa Workshop is a series of short workshops organized by ItaCa, the Italian community of category theorists:
<https://progetto-itaca.github.io/>
The focus of the ItaCa Workshop lies on the development and applications of category theory.

Students and early career researchers are particularly encouraged to attend and to submit talk proposals.

The workshop will take place in person.

Participation is free of charge but registration is mandatory.

Some funding is available to provide accommodation for speakers, with a preference for early career researchers.
Please contact the organizers, if interested.

REGISTRATION

If you want to attend the workshop, please fill in the form available at

https://forms.gle/8aR2L2PENuge4N9B8

no later than November 24.

ABSTRACT SUBMISSION

If you want to give a talk, please submit an abstract (max 1 page in pdf) no later than November 10 to:

alan.cigoli@unito.it

Acceptance will be communicated by November 17. Talks will be approximately 30 minutes long.

PROGRAM COMMITTEE

Alan Cigoli (Università di Torino) - chair
Fosco Loregian (Tallinn University of Technology)
